message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I understand its worth to you is significant, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This represents a substantial gain for you, while still allowing me a very profitable return.  Consider this a chance to acquire a key asset at a competitive price.  Let me know your thoughts.
